Useful Web Service

Hash!

01 May 2014

The most useful thing I learned today.

 a = "I like cats and cats are not dogs"
    b = Hash.new(0)

    def count_to_hash(hash)
        hash.each_char {|x| b[x] += 1}
    end

    b.count
    b.first
    b.max_by {|k,v| v}
